career_path.summary: This text outlines career opportunities following a course, specifically mentioning a Health & Safety Administrator role. It also highlights that students in this program can expect an average annual salary package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA, encouraging individuals to pursue a career in engineering.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Health & Safety Administrator
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in engineering.
